parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any specific parliamentary candidate by name or implicitly.  It discusses the importance of maintaining Romania's pro-European trajectory, a general political issue, not tied to any specific candidate's platform.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a public Facebook post, paid for and intended to reach a wide audience. The content is not a private message or personal communication.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. While the post mentions the importance of the December 2024 decisions, it does not explicitly advocate for or against any particular candidate or party. The objective seems to be to encourage the political environment to maintain a pro-European course, a general political goal, not a specific electoral objective to influence votes for a particular candidate.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>True. The post presents information in a journalistic style, reporting on a letter from business organizations. It does not contain overt calls to action or biased language designed to sway voters.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post does not express a personal opinion; it reports on the views of several business organizations.  There is no personal bias or attempt to influence the vote.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>2325791844453782</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, paid for by Mediashare, discusses the importance of maintaining Romania's pro-European trajectory.  It reports on a letter from business organizations urging political mobilization to this end.  The post does not mention any specific parliamentary candidates, nor does it explicitly endorse or oppose any particular party. The timing of the post (after the official campaign period) is not relevant because the content itself does not constitute electoral propaganda. The post's objective is to promote a general political goal, not to influence the outcome of the parliamentary elections.  Therefore, it does not meet the criteria for electoral propaganda under Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>Mediashare</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
